Miika Makinen wrote:
> 
> 
> I'm not sure if these are standardized but verbs useful for blogs come 
> to mind, like COMMENT or TRACKBACK
> 
> 
> Interesting question and I was suprised that first things coming to mind 
> (LOCK/UNLOCK, MOVE/COPY, MERGE/REPLACE) already exist in some form. Nice 
> list at http://annevankeste ren.nl/2007/ 10/http-methods 
> <http://annevankesteren.nl/2007/10/http-methods>
> ...

A better list (in that it keeps getting updated) is at 
<http://svn.tools.ietf.org/svn/wg/httpbis/draft-ietf-httpbis-method-registrations/latest/draft-ietf-httpbis-method-registrations.html#updated.registry.contents>.

BR, Julian
